name: Nuclear War Prevention Programme
description:
Prevent Nuclear Annihilation with this state of the art simulation! Designed to help you, our Nuclear Bunker operatives, to deal with high stress crisis level situations!  This Simulation provides experience of a mechanical failure starting the launch process and locking you in the room - Its down to you to solve the puzzles to unlock the keys and prevent the launch of the Missile! Don't worry, it won't really destroy the world, but should you fail, it may destroy your career opportunities!

Instructions - 

WASD to move

Mouse movement to look around

F to interact

WASD or arrow keys to adjust digits on computers

Enter to check codes on computers and unlock keys!

Good Luck, Operative!
